Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Northwest/Ardmore

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Michigan
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, State, 115th & Michigan, due to police activity near 119th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
